urgency.translation[0].definitions[0].de: the need to deal with something immediately because it is very important
urgency.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The issue should be discussed as a matter of urgency.
Despite the crisis, there appeared to be no sense of urgency.
urgency.translation[0].definitions[1].de: the feeling of wanting something immediately
urgency.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Emilia heard the urgency in his voice.
